morning.title: Ayat al-Kursi
morning.content: Allahu la ilaha illa Huwa, Al-Hayyul-Qayyum. La ta'khudhuhu sinatun wa la nawm. Lahu ma fis-samawati wa ma fil-'ard. Man dhal-ladhi yashfa'u 'indahu illa bi'idhnihi. Ya'lamu ma bayna aydihim wa ma khalfahum. Wa la yuhituna bi shay'in min 'ilmihi illa bima sha'. Wasi'a kursiyyuhus-samawati wal ard. Wa la ya'uduhu hifdhuhuma. Wa Huwal-'Aliyyul-'Adhim.
morning.virtue: Whoever says it in the morning will be protected from the jinn until the evening.

morning.title: Al-Mu'awwidhat
morning.content: Qul Huwallahu Ahad... / Qul a'udhu bi Rabbil-falaq... / Qul a'udhu bi Rabbin-nas...
morning.virtue: Whoever says them three times in the morning and evening, they will suffice him against everything.

morning.title: Morning Supplication
morning.content: Asbahna wa asbahal-mulku lillah, wal-hamdulillah, la ilaha illallah wahdahu la sharika lah, lahul-mulku wa lahul-hamd, wa Huwa 'ala kulli shay'in Qadir. Rabbi as'aluka khayra ma fi hadhal-yawmi wa khayra ma ba'dahu, wa a'udhu bika min sharri ma fi hadhal-yawmi wa sharri ma ba'dahu. Rabbi a'udhu bika minal-kasali wa su'il-kibar. Rabbi a'udhu bika min 'adhabin fin-nari wa 'adhabin fil-qabr.
morning.virtue: One of the authentic morning supplications.

morning.title: Sayyid al-Istighfar
morning.content: Allahumma Anta Rabbi la ilaha illa Anta, khalaqtani wa ana 'abduk, wa ana 'ala 'ahdika wa wa'dika mastata't. A'udhu bika min sharri ma sana't, abu'u laka bini'matika 'alayya, wa abu'u laka bidhanbi faghfirli, fa'innahu la yaghfirudh-dhunuba illa Anta.
morning.virtue: Whoever says it with certainty in the morning and dies on that day will enter Paradise.

morning.title: Comprehensive Supplication
morning.content: Allahumma bika asbahna, wa bika amsayna, wa bika nahya, wa bika namut, wa ilaykan-nushur.
morning.virtue: One of the authentic morning supplications.

morning.title: Supplication for Wellness
morning.content: Allahumma 'afini fi badani, Allahumma 'afini fi sam'i, Allahumma 'afini fi basari, la ilaha illa Anta. Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-kufri, wal-faqri, wa a'udhu bika min 'adhabil-qabr, la ilaha illa Anta.
morning.virtue: A comprehensive supplication for wellness in this life and the hereafter.

morning.title: Supplication for Worry and Grief
morning.content: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-hammi wal-hazan, wal-'ajzi wal-kasal, wal-bukhli wal-jubn, wa dala'id-dayn, wa ghalabatir-rijal.
morning.virtue: Allah will remove his worry and settle his debt.

morning.title: Supplication for Distress
morning.content: Ya Hayyu Ya Qayyum, birahmatika astaghith, aslih li sha'ni kullahu, wa la takilni ila nafsi tarfata 'ayn.
morning.virtue: A supplication for times of distress and hardship.

morning.title: Praise and Glorification
morning.content: Subhanallahi wa bihamdihi: 'adada khalqihi, wa rida nafsihi, wa zinata 'arshihi, wa midada kalimatihi.
morning.virtue: It has a great virtue and multiplied reward.

morning.title: Supplication for Contentment
morning.content: Raditu billahi Rabban, wa bil-Islami dinan, wa bi Muhammadin sallallahu 'alayhi wa sallama Nabiyyan.
morning.virtue: Whoever says it three times in the morning, it will be a right upon Allah to please him on the Day of Resurrection.

morning.title: Trust in Allah
morning.content: Bismillahil-ladhi la yadurru ma'asmihi shay'un fil-ardi wa la fis-sama'i wa Huwas-Sami'ul-'Alim.
morning.virtue: Nothing will harm him from Allah.

morning.title: Seeking Refuge from Evil
morning.content: A'udhu bikalimatillahit-tammati min sharri ma khalaq.

morning.title: Subhanallahi wa bihamdihi
morning.virtue: His sins will be forgiven even if they are like the foam of the sea. No one will come on the Day of Resurrection with anything better than what he has done, except someone who has said the same or more.

morning.title: La ilaha illallah wahdahu...
morning.content: La ilaha illallah wahdahu la sharika lah, lahul-mulku wa lahul-hamd, wa Huwa 'ala kulli shay'in Qadir.
morning.virtue: He will have a reward equivalent to that of freeing ten slaves, one hundred good deeds will be written for him, one hundred bad deeds will be erased from him, and he will have a protection from Satan for that day until evening.

evening.title: Ayat al-Kursi
evening.content: Allahu la ilaha illa Huwa, Al-Hayyul-Qayyum... (same verse)
evening.virtue: Whoever says it in the evening will be protected from the jinn until the morning.

evening.title: Al-Mu'awwidhat
evening.content: Qul Huwallahu Ahad... / Qul a'udhu bi Rabbil-falaq... / Qul a'udhu bi Rabbin-nas...
evening.virtue: Whoever says them three times in the morning and evening, they will suffice him against everything.

evening.title: Evening Supplication
evening.content: Amsayna wa amsal-mulku lillah, wal-hamdulillah, la ilaha illallah wahdahu la sharika lah, lahul-mulku wa lahul-hamd, wa Huwa 'ala kulli shay'in Qadir. Rabbi as'aluka khayra ma fi hadhihil-laylati wa khayra ma ba'daha, wa a'udhu bika min sharri ma fi hadhihil-laylati wa sharri ma ba'daha. Rabbi a'udhu bika minal-kasali wa su'il-kibar. Rabbi a'udhu bika min 'adhabin fin-nari wa 'adhabin fil-qabr.
evening.virtue: One of the authentic evening supplications.

evening.title: Sayyid al-Istighfar
evening.content: Allahumma Anta Rabbi la ilaha illa Anta... (same dua)
evening.virtue: Whoever says it with certainty in the evening and dies during that night will enter Paradise.

evening.title: Comprehensive Supplication
evening.content: Allahumma bika amsayna, wa bika asbahna, wa bika nahya, wa bika namut, wa ilaykal-masir.
evening.virtue: One of the authentic evening supplications.

evening.title: Supplication for Protection
evening.content: A'udhu bikalimatillahit-tammati min sharri ma khalaq.
evening.virtue: Whoever says it in the evening, nothing will harm him.

evening.title: Supplication for Wellness
evening.content: Allahumma inni as'alukal-'afwa wal-'afiyah fid-dunya wal-akhirah. Allahumma inni as'alukal-'afwa wal-'afiyah fi dini wa dunyaya wa ahli wa mali. Allahum-mastur 'awrati wa amin raw'ati. Allahum-mahfadhni min bayni yadayya, wa min khalfi, wa 'an yamini, wa 'an shimali, wa min fawqi, wa a'udhu bi'adhamatika an ughtala min tahti.
evening.virtue: A comprehensive supplication for protection and wellness.

evening.title: Trust in Allah
evening.content: Bismillahil-ladhi la yadurru ma'asmihi shay'un fil-ardi wa la fis-sama'i wa Huwas-Sami'ul-'Alim.
evening.virtue: Nothing will harm him from Allah.

evening.title: Supplication for Contentment
evening.content: Raditu billahi Rabban, wa bil-Islami dinan, wa bi Muhammadin sallallahu 'alayhi wa sallama Nabiyyan.
evening.virtue: Whoever says it three times in the evening, it will be a right upon Allah to please him on the Day of Resurrection.

evening.title: Praise and Monotheism
evening.content: La ilaha illallah wahdahu la sharika lah, lahul-mulku wa lahul-hamd, wa Huwa 'ala kulli shay'in Qadir.
evening.virtue: It will be for him like freeing four slaves from the descendants of Ismail.

evening.title: Subhanallahi wa bihamdihi
evening.virtue: His sins will be forgiven even if they are like the foam of the sea.
